title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Stock futures edge higher ahead of inflation reports, oil gains after OPEC+ raises output
items.description: U.S. stock-market futures inched higher Sunday, as investors await key inflation reports later this week.

items.title: OPEC+ agrees to another oil production boost in October
items.description: OPEC+ agreed Sunday to further increase oil production in October, in an ongoing move to regain market share at the expense of prices.

items.title: I’m about to inherit a lot of money. How do I make sure my husband doesn’t get any of it?
items.description: “We want to invest the money and play catch up with our retirement savings/funding.”

items.title: After my father died, my stepsister transferred assets into her name. Do I have any legal recourse?
items.description: “Since my dad died, I’ve been able to get just one box of personal mementos and some family possessions.”
